name: Bel Shalor, the Shadow in the Flame

description.value:
Necrotic

Aura 20; bright light within the aura is reduced to dim light; attacks that have the radiant keyword made by or against creatures within the aura take a -2 penalty to attack rolls; each enemy that enters the aura or starts its turn there takes 10 necrotic damage, or 20 necrotic damage while Bel Shalor is bloodied.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Cold, Necrotic

Standard

Reach 4

+38 vs Reflex; 3d12+7 cold and necrotic damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Recharge 6

Reach 4

+38 vs Fortitude; the target loses two healing surges. If it has only one surge to lose, it also loses its healing surge value in hit points. If it has no surges to lose, it loses its bloodied value in hit points.

At-Will ✦ Charm

Immediate Interrupt

Ranged 20

Trigger: When an enemy in range spends an action point, at-will

+38 vs Will; the target loses a healing surge, and Bel Shalor regains a spent action point.

At-Will ✦ Charm

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Ranged 20

+38 vs Will; Bel Shalor slides the target 4 squares.

At-Will ✦ Necrotic

Standard

Ranged 20

Targets up to five creatures; +36 vs Reflex; 2d6+7 necrotic damage, and Bel Shalor slides the target 2 squares.

Recharge 6

Area burst 3 within 20

+36 vs Reflex; 3d12+3 necrotic damage, and the target is immobilized and takes ongoing 15 necrotic damage (save ends both).

Recharge 6

Area burst 3 within 20

+36 vs Reflex; 2d12+3 necrotic damage. Effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until there are no enemies inside it. Any enemy that ends its turn within the zone takes 20 necrotic damage.

Encounter ✦ Healing

Trigger: When reduced to 0 hit points

Bel Shalor regains 200 hit points.
Bel Shalor does not roll initiative. He has three turns each round on initiative counts 45, 35, and 25.
At the start of Bel Shalor's turn, any dead creature within his aura rises as a dread wraith under his command.

system.biography:
HP 868; Bloodied 434
Resist 20/variable (3/encounter), insubstantial Vulnerable 15 radiant Immune necrotic 		Init ++0 (see shadow movement) | AP 2 | Save +5; Bel Shalor makes a saving throw against one effect at the start of his turn, and a save ends that effect even if the effect is not normally one that a save can end.
AC 48Fort 46Ref 46Will 48
Speed 8, fly 8 (hover), teleport 4; phasing
Ability ScoresStr 25 (+24)
Con 30 (+27)		Dex 24 (+24)
Int 30 (+27)		Wis 28 (+26)
Cha 35 (+29)
Languages Abyssal, Common, Draconic
Alignment Chaotic evil
Skills Arcana +32, Bluff +34, Diplomacy +34, History +32, Insight +31, Intimidate +34, Religion +32Senses ; all-around vision,Darkvision,Truesight 10
Passive Perception 36 | Insight 41
